channel.title: Drag and Drop on Mac
channel.description: Is it possible to enable drag and drop in Virtualbox on a Mac? I enabled it under Devices -> Drag and Drop but it does not work.

item.title: Drag and Drop on Mac
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

I’m sorry to tell you, but I myself never got DnD to work properly when using Mac OS as a host. I’d recommend using the “Shared Folder” feature if it’s necessary, though deactivate it after use to limit your attack surface.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
